xtream.query

Class ATumblingWindowAggregation

  • java.lang.Object
    • xtream.query.AOperator
      • xtream.query.ATumblingWindowAggregation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IInPort, IIOPort, ILSStore, IOperator, IOutPort
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MaxWindowAgg, MeanRTAgg, TumblingTimeWindowCount

    public class ATumblingWindowAggregation
extends AOperator

    This is a tumbling time/tuple window aggregation time window and tuple count based window are both supported in tandem

    A window will be closed when time length or tuple count exceeds from the given parameters. Also it is possible to set time/tuple window size as 0 to make it ignorable. It is not possible to set both parameters as 0!

    Author:
    ghalambor

        timeWindowSize - size of time window (millisec), 0 to make it inactive
